brief_title: A Study Comparing 4 Doses Of GW810781 Versus Placebo In HIV-Infected Patients
brief_summary: This study will evaluate the drop in viral load over 10 days of treatment with S-1360 versus placebo in HIV-infected patients who have not previously taken anti-HIV medications.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - No prior HIV medications. - HIV infection with viral load >400-50,000 copies/mL. - CD4 cell count >50 cells/mm. Exclusion Criteria: - Patients requiring medications that cannot be interrupted for the duration of the study. - Abnormal ECG or other chronic health conditions as noted on screening physical exam. - Previous participation in an experimental drug trial(s) within 30 days of the screening visit for this study.
